data.description:
CoSpaces Edu is an educational platform enabling students in any grade level or subject to build virtual creations, animate them with code, explore and share them in fun innovative ways including immersive VR (Virtual Reality) and AR (Augmented Reality).

Students become creators of their own content and develop 21st Century learning skills such as collaboration, critical thinking and coding, while connecting with the learning material at the same time.
Educators can also design their own interactive lessons or virtual field trips to provide students with original and engaging learning experiences that captivate and last.

Designed with a user-friendly interface making it intuitive to create with, CoSpaces Edu can be easily implemented and introduced. Only a few clicks are enough to build a first CoSpace and get started. Various resources including teacher guides, lesson plans and student check lists are available for free on cospaces.io/edu.

Please note that while the CoSpaces Edu platform is recommended to users (including kids of all ages), the CoSpaces Edu Meta app is only recommended to kids 13 and above.

changelog.change_log:
- Hebrew added as a new language.
- Bug fixes and minor improvements.

- License plan activity log improvements: Improvements to how Admins can view or download a record of all license plan activities.
- Class activity log: Teachers can now view or download a record of all class activities.
- Teacher invite codes: Simplified and secure license plan access through new invite codes for teachers.
- Editable class codes: Class codes can now be edited for better and more secure access control to classes.
- Google web search controls: Admins can enable or disable Google web search for a license plan.
- Jump in VR: It's now possible to jump when using the PICO and Meta Quest headsets.
- Various class management and checkout improvements.
- Improvements to how teachers change Skoletube students' passwords.
- Bug fixes and minor improvements.
